          <title>
            <string language="en">Windmills and air resistance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windmühlen und Luftwiderstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moulins à vent et résistance d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moinhos de vento e resistência do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mulini a vento e resistenza dell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανεμόμυλοι και αντίσταση αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Molinos de viento y resistencia del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a setup that can be used to study the effects of air resistance on the motion of windmills.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">falling weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hardboard blades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">windmills</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine Installation, die 
verwendet werden kann, um die Effekte des Luftwiderstandes auf der 
Bewegung der Windmühlen zu studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une installation qui peut 
être employée pour étudier les effets de la résistance d'air sur 
le mouvement des moulins à vent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma instalação que possa 
ser usada estudar os efeitos da resistência do ar no movimento dos 
moinhos de vento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una messa a punto che può 
essere usata per studiare gli effetti di resistenza dell'aria sul 
movimento dei mulini a vento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση που μπορεί 
να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να μελετήσει τα αποτελέσματα της αντίστασης 
αέρα στην κίνηση των ανεμόμυλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una disposición que se 
pueda utilizar para estudiar los efectos de la resistencia del aire en
el movimiento de molinos de viento.</string>
          </description>
